REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1252 reute r f BC-GENERAL-ELECTRIC<GE>- 04-07 0096

TEXT.TITLE: GENERAL ELECTRIC<GE>-POWERED HELICOPTER UNVEILED
TEXT.BODY: General Electric Co said that EH Industries, a joint effort between <Westland Helicopter> of England and the <Augusta Group> of Italy, rolled out the first prototype EH 101 helicopter in Yeovil, England. GE said the helicopter is powered by three GE T700 engines. The company added that the multi-mission EH 101 has naval, utility and civil models. The latter two will be powered by 2,000 shaft horsepower CT7-6 engines being co-developed by GE, <Fiat Aviazione> and <Alfa Romeo Avio>, GE said. Reuter
